scripts.snippet: COPY purchase_order (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/purchaseOrders.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY adjustment (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/adjustments.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY claim (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/claims.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY cost (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/costs.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY details (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/details.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY eresource (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/eresource.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY fund_distribution (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/fundDistribution.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY location (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/location.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY physical (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/physical.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY source (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/source.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY vendor_detail (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/vendorDetail.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';
COPY po_line (id, jsonb) FROM 'data/poLines.data' ENCODING 'UTF8' DELIMITER E'	';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW receiving_history_view AS SELECT pieces.id AS id, json_build_object('id', pieces.jsonb->>'id', 'caption', pieces.jsonb->>'caption', 'comment', pieces.jsonb->>'comment', 'item_id', pieces.jsonb->>'item_id', 'po_line_id', pieces.jsonb->>'po_line_id', 'po_line_number', po_line.jsonb->>'po_line_number', 'received_date', pieces.jsonb->>'received_date', 'title', po_line.jsonb->>'title', 'receiving_note', details.jsonb->>'receiving_note', 'receiving_status', pieces.jsonb->>'receiving_status', 'supplement', pieces.jsonb->>'supplement') AS jsonb FROM pieces LEFT OUTER JOIN po_line ON pieces.jsonb->>'po_line_id' = po_line.jsonb->>'id' LEFT OUTER JOIN details ON details.jsonb->>'po_line_id' = po_line.jsonb->>'id';
